name: Mallow Technologies Private Limited
overview:
We at, Mallow Technologies, deliver quality iPhone and iPad applications. We achieve the highest quality by following:

  • Meticulous planning - This is where our success starts and so we pay close attention to even minor details

  • Employing highly skilled professionals - Highest quality can be achieved only through employing professionals who have good expertise in the corresponding fields

  • Customer focus - Delivering products that meet the clients’s requirements and for that we start by understanding the requirements from client’s view.
